Row.Cell: confrontl_laszlo_mi_nabid_MXNy

László made me an offer. If I help him conspire against Jan, I'll receive the dead Peter's equipment. Politely but clearly, I turned him down. I have my honour, after all. The handover will still take place, so that Jan can properly bury his brother. I hope László doesn't cause any more problems.
拉斯洛提出一个条件。如果我帮助他密谋反对扬，我将得到死去彼得的装备。我礼貌而明确地拒绝了他。我毕竟要维护自己的荣誉。交接还是要进行，这样扬就可以安葬他的哥哥。我希望拉斯洛不会再制造任何麻烦。
confrontl_laszlo_mi_nabid_Zanm

László made me an offer. If I help him conspire against Jan, he'll provide me with such equipment that many a knight could only dream about. Sounds interesting, but I don't like the idea of joining up with his Cumans.
拉斯洛向我提出了一个条件。如果我帮助他密谋对付扬，他将为我提供许多骑士梦寐以求的装备。听起来很有意思，但我不想与他的库曼人联手。
confrontl_p_kdyz_jsem_zji_l9or
When I learned that Peter was dead, I knew that László wasn't playing fair with Jan. But that's all I learned.
当我得知彼得死了，我知道拉斯洛对扬使了诈，但我就知道这么多。
confrontl_p_naoko_jsem_la_mTFg
I lied to László, telling him I would betray Jan and lead him into a trap. If I tell Jan about these plans in time, we can think up a way to protect ourselves.
我对拉斯洛撒了谎，告诉他我会背叛扬，把他引入陷阱。如果我把这些计划及时告诉扬，我们可以想出一个保护自己的办法。
confrontl_p_oboril_jsem_s_aerd
I told László that I know what happened to Peter. He responded that Jan will want his body back to bury it. So a handover should take place in any case.
我告诉拉斯洛，我知道彼得发生了什么。他回答说，扬会希望要回尸体埋葬。所以无论如何都应该进行交接。
councilman_konsel_je_na_n_O6WM
I fought a duel of honour on Tuchmacher's behalf against Jan of Lesztin. I won, and Tuchmacher promised me he'd support the Kingfisher baths in the council vote.
我代表图赫马赫进行了一场荣誉决斗，在这场与列斯汀的扬的较量中，我成功胜出。图赫马赫也因此向我承诺，他将在市议会投票时向翠鸟澡堂提供他的支持。
crouch_v_rybniku_nejsme_s_WDZu

Me and Sir Hans are not alone in the pond. A little further along by the banks there are some girls bathing, and Sir Hans, gentleman that he is, wants to go and spy on them. We'll have to keep our heads down in the reeds, otherwise we'll cause a stir.
光顾这片池塘的，不止我和汉斯少主。沿岸稍远处有群姑娘在洗澡。汉斯少主一展绅士风度，欲要上前窥探。我们得在芦苇丛中藏好，不然麻烦就大了。
defeatjan_p_laszlo_padl_v_V3ul
Everything that could go wrong did go wrong. Sir Peter is dead, Jan of Suchotlesky is dead, and so too is Baron Farkas. No one gained anything from it all. There was no winner…
满盘皆输。彼得爵士死了，苏霍茨基的扬也死了，法卡斯男爵也死了。没有人从中获利。没有赢家……
defeatlas_p_jan_padl_v_bo_oQHZ
Unfortunately, Jan did not survive his second encounter with László's Cumans. But at least he's now with his brother. May the earth rest lightly on them.
不幸的是，与拉斯洛的库曼人进行第二次对抗时，扬没有幸存下来。但至少他现在和哥哥在一起了。愿他们安息。
deliverof_knez_marian_ves_0zKe

Father Marian doesn't believe in the local legend about a gateway to hell in the abandoned mines near Old Kutna. Nevertheless, he hired me to look into it to put a stop to the rumours. He gave me some food to prepare as an offering for demons in the mines. We'll see who really comes to pick it up.
当地传说称老库特纳附近的废弃矿场有一个通往地狱的通道，神父马里安并不相信。尽管如此，他还是雇我去调查，以终止谣言。他给了我一些食物，用来献祭矿井里的恶魔。我们可以看看究竟是谁会来拿走这些东西。
deliverof_knez_marian_ves_hL9O

Father Marian doesn't believe in the local legend about a gateway to hell in the abandoned mines near Old Kutna. Nevertheless, he hired me to look into it to put a stop to the rumours. He gave me some supplies to lower into the mine. That will no longer be possible, since the locals were stricken by an unforseeable event...
当地传说称老库特纳附近的废弃矿场有一个通往地狱的通道，神父马里安并不相信。尽管如此，他还是雇我去调查，以终止谣言。他给了我一些物资，让我下放到矿井。这将不再可能实施，因为当地人被一个不可预知的事件所困扰......
deliverof_knez_marian_ves_y2gR

Father Marian doesn't believe in the local legend about a gateway to hell in the abandoned mines near Old Kutna. Nevertheless, he hired me to look into it to put a stop to the rumours. He gave me some supplies and I lowered them into the mine. But what I lured out were no demons. Or were they?
当地传说称老库特纳附近的废弃矿场有一个通往地狱的通道，神父马里安并不相信。尽管如此，他还是雇我去调查，以终止谣言。他给了我一些物资，我把它们下放到矿井。但我引出来的东西究竟是不是恶魔，我心里也没数。
dones_cev_nakonec_jsem_ce_GOA1
In the end, I brought Gules Canker's mace as proof.
最后，我把“溃疡”的页锤交给了古勒斯作为证据。
dones_cev_podarilo_se_mi__pmhU
I managed to deceive Gules into thinking that Canker is dead when I brought him his mace.
我把页锤带给了古勒斯，假称“溃疡”已经死了，成功骗过了他。
dones_cev_ted_uz_mi_staci_nTCL
Now all I have to do is pick up Canker's mace and bring it as proof to Gules.
现在我只需要捡走“溃疡”的页锤，将其作为证据交给古勒斯就可以了。
dones_cev_ted_uz_mi_staci_SNKq
Now all I have to do is bring Canker's mace as proof to Gules.
现在我只需要把“溃疡”的页锤作为证据交给古勒斯就可以了。
dvojityag_getreinforcemen_o5PF
Find reinforcements for Jan.
为扬找增援。
dvojityag_gowithjantohand_Foxl
Tell Jan once you are ready to head out.
等准备好了，就去找扬。
dvojityag_reinforcements__wNNA
Reinforcements - Mikesh and Kozliek.
增援——米凯什和科兹里克。
dvojityag_rewardfromjan_m4qx
Go and see Jan for your reward.
去见扬，要你的奖赏。
dvojityag_telljanlaszlois_LObM
Tell Jan that László died.
告诉扬，拉斯洛死了。
dvojityag_telljanwhatyouk_Bp4g
Tell Jan what you found out in the camp.
告诉扬你在营地里发现了什么。
dvojityag_zabij_jana_pKMM
Kill Jan.
杀了扬。
fetch_pac_beta_po_me_chce_MYoy
Betty wants me to bring her some package from Grund and to pick up Matsek the wagoner, who went there before me.
贝蒂希望我能从格兰德为她取回一些包裹，并将早先前往那里的马车夫马切克接回。
finaltalk_knez_marian_me__wSNx
Father Marian rewarded me for my help. There's no one guarding the pit to hell now, as the only demon turned out to be the deranged knight, Taras Mura.
神父马里安奖励我伸出援手。现在通往地狱的深坑无人看守，因为疯狂的骑士塔拉斯·穆拉才是唯一的恶魔。
finaltalk_vsechno_co_se_s_j3B4
I should visit Father Marian and discuss everything that happened.
我应该去拜访神父马里安，讨论所发生的一切。
findoutwh_k_bozene_prisli_eJ8P
Some fellows came to Bozhena's looking for us. They claimed to be from Lord von Bergow, but that was a lie. More likely they belong to that band that attacked us down by the pond.
有几个人来博珍娜家找我们，自称在冯·波尔高大人的麾下。胡说八道，他们分明像是在池塘边袭击我们的那伙人。
gethalberd_rytir_jan_mi_d_29hr

Sir Jan recommended I take one of the halberds previously carried by his men. We won't have the numbers on our side in this fight, so keeping the enemy back will be crucial. I decided to follow the knight's advice.
扬爵士建议我拿上他手下以前携带的一把战戟。在这场战斗中，我们要以寡敌众，所以拦阻敌人至关重要。我决定听从这位骑士的建议。
gethalberd_rytir_jan_mi_d_6E1O
Sir Jan recommended I take one of the halberds previously carried by his men. We won't have the numbers on our side in this fight, so keeping the enemy back will be crucial.
扬爵士建议我拿上他手下以前携带的一把战戟。在这场战斗中，我们要以寡敌众，所以拦阻敌人至关重要。
gethalberd_rytir_jan_mi_d_XHfu
Sir Jan recommended I take one of the halberds previously carried by his men. I prefer my own weaponry, however, and don't require anything else.
扬爵士建议我拿上他手下以前携带的一把战戟。不过，我更喜欢自己的兵器装备，不需要其他东西。
getreinfo_p_bohuzel_se_mi_Y7lT
I didn't arrange any reinforcements against László with Jan.
我并未与扬指派任何援军来对付拉斯洛。
getreinfo_p_na_janovu_zad_1EFU
At Jan's request, I've found a few fearless men who I can count on.
在扬的要求下，我找到了几个可信而无畏的人选。
getreinfo_p_na_janovu_zad_o9ni
A nice little group will be accompanying me to meet László. I hope Jan will be happy.
一支精锐小队将陪同我去见拉斯洛。我希望扬会很高兴。
gowithjan_mel_bych_si_zar_KBdq
I should take care of all necessary affairs, then return to Jan and go for the handover. The journey will take some time. It'll be best if we head out before noon.
我应该处理好所有必要事务，再回到扬那里然后去，交接。路途有些遥远，最好在中午前出发。
gowithjan_vzhledem_k_nast_wFK2
Given the situation, there's no point in going with Jan to the agreed-upon handover.
鉴于这种情况，和扬一起去约定的交接地点没有意义。
kubaparalu_podej_zpravu_o_6frC
Give the report on the killing of Father Prokop.
汇报普罗科普神父被杀一事。
kubaparalu_zabij_prokopa_GkKX
Kill Father Prokop.
杀死普罗科普神父。
location_krcak
Kerchak Pond
科尔察克池塘
location_vezak
Rocktower Pond
石塔池塘
location_vidlak
Vidlak Pond
维德拉克池塘
lootersco_jak_to_s_dranci_wKNG
I'll never know what happened to the looters because I simply walked away. I can't expect Jan to forgive me for doing so.
我永远不会知道那些劫掠者发生了什么，因为我直接走开了。我不能指望扬会原谅我的所作所为。
lootersco_osud_dranciru_b_GChI
The fate of the looters was sealed the moment Sir Jan beheld their godless behaviour. No one was left alive.
当扬爵士看到他们的大逆不道行为时，这些劫掠者已经难逃一死。最终没人幸免。
nasleduj__jakmile_jsme_me_P4Ln
Me and Godwin went back down to the secret passageway. We were lucky - nobody came across Zizka or Katherine.
我和古德温回到了秘密通道里。杰式卡和凯瑟琳没被人撞见，我们真走运。
nasleduj__uz_mame_vsechno_jb6a
We've already got everything, so now I have to hurry back to Godwin. Zizka and Katherine are waiting.
东西都到手了，我得尽快跟古德温汇合。杰式卡和凯瑟琳还在等着我们。
nasleduj__zautocila_na_na_ltPL
An unknown band of armed men attacked us. Me and Sir Hans swam across the pond. Our company in the camp was slain to the last man and I was wounded too.
我们遭到了一队陌生兵寇的袭击。我和汉斯少主游过池塘，得以幸存。营地里所有人都被杀了，我也身负重伤。
naverbuj__kozlik_je_jedni_6Dsb
Kozliek has been serving under Zizka for a long time. Now he's a member of my company.
科兹里克曾在杰式卡手下工作了很久。现在他是我连队的一员了。
naverbuj__kozlik_je_jedni_r0GH
Kozliek has been serving under Zizka for a long time. Now he'll be reporting to me.
科兹里克曾在杰式卡手下工作了很久。现在他要向我报道了。
naverbuj__zizka_mi_dal_ve_1cxY
Zizka assigned two of his most experienced men to my company: Mikesh and Kozliek.
杰式卡把他最有经验的两个人派给了我的连队：米凯什和科兹里克。
naverbuj__zizka_mi_dal_ve_1zA6
Zizka put me in command of two of his experienced men. I’ll likely find Mikesh and Kozliek on the battlements.
杰式卡让我指挥他那两个身经百战的手下。我去城垛上或许就能找到米凯什和科兹里克。
nebakovob_osetri_kozlika_aXZ5
Treat Kozliek.
治疗科兹里克。
negotiate_nastoupil_jsem__UE7j

I told László that I know what happened to Peter. His response surprised me. Not batting an eyelid, he made me an offer, a rather dishonourable one. In my situation, though, it would be foolish to turn it down. I do feel sorry for Jan though…
我告诉拉斯洛，我知道彼得发生了什么。他的反应让我吃惊。他眼皮都不眨一下，给我开了个条件，一个相当可耻的条件。不过，如果我拒绝，就显得愚蠢。但我确实为扬感到难过......
negotiate_oslovil_jsem_la_Qaz6

I spoke to László and introduced myself as Jan's intermediary. Although László received me, during our negotiations he made it abundantly clear that he was the one setting conditions. He agreed the handover would take place on neutral ground, but when I wanted to see the captive, László adamantly refused. I hope Jan won't be disappointed with the outcome.
我与拉斯洛交谈，说自己是扬的中间人。虽然拉斯洛接待了我，但在我们的谈判中，他非常清楚地表示，他才是开出条件的人。他同意在中立地点进行交接，但当我要看俘虏时，拉斯洛坚决拒绝。我希望扬不会对这个结果感到失望。
negotiate_p_laszla_jsem_r_fT31
I immediately told László I know what happened to Peter. László claimed that Jan will certainly want to bury Peter's body. We agreed where the body will be handed over. Jan should be cautious though…
我立即告诉拉斯洛我知道彼得发生了什么。拉斯洛称，扬肯定会想埋葬彼得的尸体。我们商定了要在哪里进行尸体交接。但扬应该谨慎行事......
oblehanis_naverbuj_kozlika_I3xd
Recruit Kozliek.
征募科兹里克。
oblehanis_naverbuj_mikese_DRBj
Recruit Mikesh and Kozliek.
征募米凯什和科兹里克。
opatrne_n_holky_nas_sice__z1kr

Capon and I weren't alone in the pond. A bit further along the shore some laundresses were bathing and Capon had the bright idea of going to spy on them. Although the girls didn’t spot us, we didn’t enjoy their scantily dressed loveliness for long.
光顾这片池塘的，不止我和汉斯少主。沿岸稍远处有几名洗衣女在洗澡。卡蓬起了雅兴，欲要上前窥探。虽然我们未被发现，但也没能欣赏她们的曼妙身姿太久。
opatrne_n_nakonec_se_to_u_z6fe

Capon and I weren't alone in the pond. A bit further along the shore some laundresses were bathing and Capon had the bright idea of going to spy on them.That turned out to be one damned stupid idea! We just ended up scaring one of the girls.
光顾这片池塘的，不止我和汉斯少主。沿岸稍远处有几名洗衣女在洗澡。卡蓬起了雅兴，欲要上前窥探。真是个馊主意！我们吓到了其中一位姑娘。
osetri_ko_kozlik_byl_rane_f48n
Kozliek was wounded in battle. I should take a look at him and treat him.
科兹里克在战斗中负伤。我得查看他的伤势并对他进行治疗。
osetri_ko_raneneho_kozlik_ly6P
I examined the injured Kozliek and treated him.
我查看了科兹里克的伤势并提供了治疗。
osetri_ko_zraneneho_kozli_1tUG
I didn't treat the injured Kozliek.
我没有治疗受伤的科兹里克。
plesnivec_dones_cevenakov_D3ob
Bring Gules Canker's mace.
把“溃疡”的页锤带给古勒斯。
pokracuj__chvala_panu_vuz_GwQT

Thank God! I made it to the wagon and Katherine's other allies. After waiting a few hours for von Bergow's soldiers to call off the search, we got Zizka onto the cart and set off for the Kuttenberg region.
谢天谢地！我终于找到了那辆马车和凯瑟琳的其他伙伴。我们等了几个小时，终于等到冯·波尔高的手下结束了搜捕，随后帮杰式卡上了马车，便朝着库滕堡地区行进。
pomodli_s_knez_prokop_z_k_AgWa
Father Prokop of Kuttenberg sent me on a penitential pilgrimage to the shrine of the Virgin Mary in Bohunowitz. I prayed to the Virgin and repented of my sins.
库滕堡的普罗科普神父指派我前往博胡诺维茨的圣母玛利亚教堂进行朝圣。我已向圣母祈祷，为我的罪孽进行了忏悔。
pomodli_s_knez_prokop_z_k_cpsm
Father Prokop of Kuttenberg sent me on a penitential pilgrimage to the shrine of the Virgin Mary in Bohunowitz. I am to pray at the chapel and repent of my sins.
库滕堡的普罗科普神父指派我前往博胡诺维茨的圣母玛利亚教堂进行朝圣，我得到那里去进行祈祷，为我的罪孽进行忏悔。
pomodli_s_knez_prokop_z_k_ddIv

Father Prokop of Kuttenberg sent me on a penitential pilgrimage to the shrine of the Virgin Mary in Bohunowitz. I was supposed to pray to her and repent of my sins, but Father Procop has since died. I must seek redemption elsewhere.
库滕堡的普罗科普神父指派我前往博胡诺维茨的圣母玛利亚教堂进行朝圣。而我本该向圣母祈祷，祈求洗清我的罪孽，然而神父普罗科普却在此期间与世长辞，如今我必须得到别处寻找赎罪之法。
promluv_s_kozlik_byl_vybr_Rbr9
Kozliek was chosen for the raid. I could send Mikesh with him.
我选择派科兹里克参加突袭，也也可以派米凯什和他一起去。
promluv_s_kozlik_se_rad_v_NIIc
Kozliek is a betting man, but should I be betting his life on today's raid?
科兹里克是个赌徒，但我要拿他的命作今天突袭的赌注吗？
promluv_s_mikes_a_kozlik__Xhu8
Mikesh and Kozliek should be on guard duty in the courtyard. If I want to select them for the raid I should find them there.
米凯什和科兹里克正在庭院执勤。若想派他们参加突袭，我应该去那里找到他们。
promluv_s_mikes_byl_vybra_l9oL
Mikesh was chosen for the raid. I could send Kozliek with him.
我选择派米凯什参加突袭，也可以派科兹里克和他一起去。
promluv_s_mikes_i_kozlik__RV4t
Mikesh and Kozliek were both chosen for the raid. They work well together.
米凯什和科兹里克都被选中参加突袭，他们配合默契。
promluv_s_na_vypad_jsem_z_Q62e
From my company, I chose Kozliek for the raid.
我从部下中选择了科兹里克去参加突袭。
promluv_s_nikdy_jsem_vdov_NqcL
I never told the widow what happened to the remains of her admirer Jan.
我从未告诉这位寡妇她的仰慕者扬的遗体发生了什么。
promluv_s_posvecena_puda__lkc5
The graveyard's consecrated earth covered Jan's bones, and his soul will now find redemption. All that's left to do now is talk to the widow Margaret.
墓地圣土覆盖了扬的尸骨，他的灵魂现在将得到救赎。现在所要做的就是和寡妇玛格丽特谈谈。
promluv_s_vdova_marketa_k_d5o4
The widow Margaret finally redeemed her sin, because she didn't kill her admirer Jan, but only covered up the truth about his death.
寡妇玛格丽特终于赎了罪，因为她没有杀死她的仰慕者扬，只是掩盖了他死亡的真相。
promluv_s_vdova_marketa_m_VWra

The widow Margaret told me her secret: an innocent man died because of her. What makes her sin even worse is that the soul of the hermit's brother Jan is not at peace. Margaret never told anyone that her lover killed his rival, Jan, in a duel, and together they covered his tracks. When the young man was found dead with a broken skull at the bottom of a cliff, it was assumed he'd killed himself out of unrequited love. Jan's body was buried outside the graveyard because suicides cannot enter the Kingdom of Heaven.
寡妇玛格丽特将她的秘密告诉了我：一个无辜的男人因她而死。隐士的弟弟扬的灵魂不得安宁，这令她的罪孽更加深重。玛格丽特从未告诉过任何人，她的情人在决斗中杀死了对手扬，然后他们一起掩盖了他的踪迹。当这个年轻人的尸体在悬崖下被发现时，头骨已经破碎，人们认为他是因为爱而不得才寻短见。扬的尸体被埋在墓地外，因为自杀者不能进入天国。
promluv_s_vybral_jsem_na__ChY3
I chose Kozliek for the raid. I hope it's the right choice.
我选择了科兹里克去突袭。希望这是正确的选择。
qdesc_dvojityagent_27AM
Jan of Suchotlesky has sent me in his name to negotiate the release of his brother, a knight who is held captive in Sigismund's camp.
苏霍茨基的扬派我以他之名去谈判，要求释放他的哥哥，后者被囚禁在西格斯蒙德营地。
qdesc_zachrana_IRWe

Me and Hans Capon managed to flee from the raiders who attacked us at the pond. We found refuge that night with Bozhena, an old herb woman living nearby. She took care of me, but Sir Hans got worse during the night. Now I have to get my strength back and then help Bozhena care for Sir Hans, if at all possible.
我和汉斯·卡蓬成功从池塘的偷袭脱身，当晚在附近的老采药女博珍娜家中避难。她对我悉心照料，但汉斯大人的伤情在夜间加重。现在我必须尽可能恢复体力，帮助博珍娜护理汉斯大人。
questfail_jan_ze_suchotle_rqWv
Jan of Suchotlesky died before we managed to put an end to this matter. I'll pray for him this evening at least.
苏霍茨基的扬在我们了结这件事之前就死了。至少今晚我会为他祈祷。
reinforce_mikes_s_kozlike_TyTD
Mikesh and Kozliek from Zizka's band could come in handy.
杰式卡的米凯什和科兹里克可以派上用场。
rewardfro_p_bitka_u_preda_wfyw
László made his bed and now sleeps in it. I think that Jan will recognise me for my aid and that I deserve a reward.
拉斯洛自作自受。我想，扬会感激我的援助，并认为我值得奖赏。
rewardfro_p_jana_sme_kras_H19N
Jan paid for his gullibility and is now with his brother Peter. I hope that László Farkas recognises my help and rewards me as promised.
扬为他的轻信付出了代价，现在跟哥哥彼得在黄泉相聚了。我希望拉斯洛·法卡斯能赏识我的帮助，并按承诺给我奖励。
rewardfro_p_jan_umrel_nez_qQtV
Jan didn't manage to thank me before he died.
扬还没来得及感谢我就去世了。
rewardfro_p_jsem_sice_vsi_5bX6
Jan acted honourably and courageously, but still lost in the end. And I profited from it.
扬的行为体面而勇敢，但最后还是输了。而我却从中获利。
rewardfro_p_s_janem_jsme__AnIW
I probably won't get any reward from Jan now.
看来现在我无法再向扬获取报酬了。
rewardfro_p_vsechno_krasn_GjyV
Jan was devastated by the loss of his brother but admitted that without my help, things would have ended much worse.
扬为失去哥哥而感到悲痛，但他承认，如果没有我的帮助，事情的结局会更糟糕。
rutinaavy_promluv_si_s_ko_E96O
Speak with Kozliek
与科兹里克谈谈。
s54_trask_poslechni_si_st_5czR
Listen to Knuckle's proposal.
听取巧指的建议。
searching_hynek_nelhal_ry_Sdmq
The captured knight, Hynek wasn't lying. Sir Peter of Suchotlesky is dead, yet László still wants to get his hands on Jan's money. I could threaten to reveal the truth. Or go straight to Jan…
那个被俘的骑士海尼克并没有说谎。苏霍茨基的彼得爵士已经死了，然而拉斯洛仍然想得到扬的钱。我可以威胁说要揭露真相。或者直接去找扬…
searching_jan_me_posila_s_gRBP
Jan has sent me to negotiate on his behalf with László Farkas. Jan told me nothing more about him, so I'll have to find him myself in Sigismund's camp.
扬派我代表他与拉斯洛·法卡斯进行谈判。扬没有告诉我更多关于他的信息，所以我必须亲自到西格斯蒙德营地去找他。
searching_jan_me_poslal_d_4KqX
Jan has sent me to Sigismund's camp to negotiate with László Farkas. After asking around a bit, I found out I should look somewhere below the smithy. I hope that doesn't mean half the camp.
扬派我去西格斯蒙德的营地找拉斯洛·法卡斯进行谈判。四处打听了一下，线索指向铁匠铺下面的某个地方，希望能好找一点。
searching_moje_podezreni__sxLD

I immediately had the feeling something was off. My suspicions were warranted. Sir Peter of Suchotlesky has already met his maker, and here László Farkas is prattling on about a prisoner exchange. I could tell him I know the truth. After all, if Jan finds out what has happened, he won't let it go.
一股不祥的预感瞬间生起。我怀疑得没错。苏霍茨基的彼得爵士已经去见了上帝，而拉斯洛·法卡斯却在这里喋喋不休地谈论交换囚犯的事情。我可以告诉他我知道真相。毕竟，如果扬知道了这件事，他不会善罢甘休。
searching_p_s_laszlem_jse_jjXT
I negotiated the terms of the captive's release and went to inform Jan. I didn't see Peter in the camp. László says he'll take him to the agreed-upon place for the handover.
我谈好了释放俘虏的条件，然后去通知扬。 我在营地里没有看到彼得。拉斯洛说他会带他到约定的地点进行交接。
talktobal_konflikt_s_mist_EXgR
Conflict with the local riffraff was averted. Now I need to decide with Jan on how to move forward.
与当地暴徒的冲突得以避免。现在我需要和扬一起决定后续行动。
talktobal_po_zazehnani_ko_czCr
Having averted the conflict with the looters, Jan and I decided on our next move. Tracking the band of Cumans won't be difficult.
在避免了与劫掠者的冲突之后，扬和我决定了我们的下一步行动。追踪库曼人的队伍并不困难。
talktobal_po_zazehnani_ko_GUVB
Having averted the conflict with the looters, Jan and I have yet to discuss our next move. That's because I went away, bringing our quest to an unsuccessful finish.
在避免了与劫掠者的冲突之后，扬和我还没有讨论我们的下一步行动。因为我离开了，我们的探险以失败告终。
taras_mura_finaltalkvilla_92Ug
Talk to Father Marian.
和神父马里安交谈。
telljanla_jana_mrzelo_ze__cFTY
Jan regretted not getting his brother's body back, but he was glad that László got what he deserved…
没有拿回哥哥的尸体，扬感到遗憾，但他很高兴拉斯洛得到了报应......
telljanla_mel_bych_zajit__gBT3
I should go to Jan and tell him about László.
我应该去找扬，将拉斯洛的事告诉他。
telljanwh_jan_hodla_pro_s_m8x0
Jan is willing to risk his life for his brother Peter. But I serve the Lords of Leipa... The Lords of Suchotlesky will have to manage without me.
扬甘愿为了他的兄弟彼得赌上性命。但我在为莱佩的领主效力……苏霍茨基的领主们只能自己想办法处理问题了。
telljanwh_kdyz_jsem_rekl__9gl8
When I told Jan about his brother's death, he cursed László and his whole damned family. He has now sworn himself to avenging Peter. But we need more men for that…
当我告诉扬他哥哥的死讯时，他诅咒了拉斯洛和他整个该死的家族。他现在发誓要为彼得报仇。但要复仇，我们需要更多的人......
telljanwh_kdyz_se_jan_dov_yj68

When Jan heard about his brother's death, he was devastated. The news about the impending attack was the final drop. Taking to heart the adage 'the best defence is a good offense', he told me to get ready for combat and find a few experienced warriors to accompany us to the handover site.
当听说自己哥哥的死讯时，扬大受打击。最后的一击，是即将发生的袭击。他牢记“最佳防御是一种良好的进攻”这句格言，让我做好战斗准备，找几个有经验的战士陪同我们去交接地点。
telljanwh_misto_predani_a_42OF

Jan was surprised by where the handover was to take place and the ransom amount, but he says the blood of kin can't be counted in coin. He also regretted that I hadn't seen Peter, but understood that in our situation I couldn't be giving orders. I should prepare for departure.
扬对交接地点和赎金数额感到惊讶，但他说亲人不能用钱币衡量。我没有见到彼得，他对此感到遗憾，但他明白，鉴于我们的情况，当时的我不可能发号施令。我应该准备出发了。
telljanwh_p_mrtvy_petr_na_mPRO
Jan, informed of Peter's death, still sent me back to the camp to negotiate the handover of the captive.
扬在得知彼得的死讯后，仍然派我回到营地，商谈俘虏的交接......
telljanwh_povedel_jsem_ja_DGAF
I told Jan everything about the conditions of the handover, but kept the truth about Peter to myself, instead assuring him that everything would go smoothly. Now we must go to the handover location.
我把交接条件全部告诉了扬，但隐瞒了有关彼得的真相，向他保证一切会顺利进行。现在我们必须去交接地点。
telljanwh_p_sice_jsem_jan_mNxt

At first, I lied a bit to Jan, but then it began to gnaw on me. In the end, I admitted everything and told him the truth about Peter. Jan, understanding the situation, decided to exact revenge upon Farkas.
起初，我对扬撒了谎，但后来我于心不忍。最后，我承认了一切，将有关彼得的真相告诉了他。扬了解情况后，决定对法卡斯进行报复......
telljanwh_p_vzhledem_k_ok_A7Kj
Given the circumstances, there's no use in talking over the outcomes of the negotiations with Jan.
鉴于这种情况，跟扬谈论谈判的结果没有意义。
telljanwh_vyjednal_jsem_v_KY0b
I've negotiated everything I need to in the camp. I must now return to Jan and prepare for the handover.
我已经在营地里进行了所有必要的谈判。我现在必须回到扬身边，为交接做准备。
tmp_setke_mam_jit_do_tabo_RVPP

They must have noticed we're gone, because the forest is swarming with soldiers looking for us! It seems Katherine's ally Mika is waiting for us with a wagon in some abandoned camp south of here, but Zizka's in a really bad way! I’ll go and find him and tell him what happened. But I have to be careful no soldiers see me. That would be the end.
我们逃跑的事情一定是败露了，因为树林里到处都是搜捕我们的士兵！凯瑟琳的朋友米卡，似乎就在南边某个废弃的营地，备好了马车等着我们，可是现在杰式卡的处境很糟糕！我得找到他，并告诉他发生了什么。但是我得小心，不能让士兵们发现我，万一被逮到就全完了。
tmp_setke_stretl_jsem_bor_VoJ8

Our absence must have been discovered, because the forest is swarming with soldiers looking for us! It seems Katherine's ally Mika is waiting for us with a wagon in some abandoned camp south of here, but Zizka's in a really bad way! I’ll go and find him and tell him what happened.
我们逃跑的事情一定是败露了，因为树林里到处都是搜捕我们的士兵！凯瑟琳的朋友米卡，似乎就在南边某个废弃的营地，备好了马车等着我们，可是现在杰式卡的处境很糟糕！我得找到他，并告诉他发生了什么。
ui_maplegend_laundry
Laundry
洗衣点
vezninatr_dojdi_na_konec__qO96
Accompany Zizka, Katherine and Godwin to the end of the passageway.
陪杰式卡、凯瑟琳、古德温一起走出密道。
vloz_osta_splnil_jsem_o_c_iwns
I did what the widow asked of me, exactly as the old hermit prophesied. The widow Margaret's sins were forgiven and Jan's soul finally found peace.
正如老隐士预言的那样，我做了寡妇要求我做的事。寡妇玛格丽特的罪孽得到了宽恕，而扬的灵魂也最终得到安宁。
vloz_osta_zbyva_posledni__4Hkq
All that's left to do is lay Jan's bones in the graveyard's consecrated ground where they belong.
剩下要做的就是把扬的遗骨安葬在墓地圣土上，那才是它们的归宿。
vykopej_h_pokud_chci_vdov_FpIK
If I'm going to help the widow, I have to dig a grave in consecrated ground and lay Jan's remains to rest here.
如果我要帮助这个寡妇，我必须在圣土上挖一个坟墓，将扬的遗体安葬在这里。
vypatrej__dle_otce_prokop_rXWA
According to Father Prokop, Jarka was a kind girl who served the local von Grolle family. Father Prokop feels responsible, but mainly blames a wandering minstrel named William.
通过与普罗科普神父了解得知，贾卡生前是个好姑娘，还曾服侍过冯·格罗尔一家。尽管心怀愧疚，但神父普罗科普还是将贾卡的死怪罪到了一位叫威廉的吟游诗人头上。
vypatrej__jarka_nejstarsi_c3Oh

Jarka, the oldest victim of the mad murderer, was the ward of a local priest, Father Prokop. It shouldn't be too hard to track him down and talk to him about Jarka and her condition before the murder.
贾卡是头几位惨遭疯狂杀手谋害的姑娘，同时也是当地牧师普罗科普神父的养女。要想找到这位神父并与他谈论贾卡及其生前境况并非难事。
vypatrej__nepodarilo_se_m_KLSW
I didn't manage to learn anything more from Father Prokop about the life and death of his ward Jarka, and so the investigation has hit a dead end. Just like Father Prokop.
我没能向普罗科普神父打探到任何与其养女贾卡生死相关的信息。正如一命呜呼的神父，案件调查的进展也因此被中断。
vypatrej__podarilo_se_mi__3ykB
I managed to glean from Father Prokop that Jarka was pregnant, so it was a double murder. Perhaps the father of the child wanted to silence the mother before she disgraced him?
通过向普罗科普神父了解得知，当时的贾卡已经怀有身孕，因此那凶手实际上害死了两条人命。难道是孩子父亲担忧名誉扫地，才杀害了贾卡？
zabij_jana_planovane_miro_UA1T

The idea of a peaceful handover was a naive one. First an argument broke out that soon grew into a fight. I had to make a quick decision. Jan might be honourable, but he's also naive, dangerously so. There is a war on, and in war, it's the strong that win. And Baron Farkas is strong. I'm not proud of it, but he offered a better deal. At least Jan is with Peter now.
和平交接的想法太过天真。双方先是发生了争执，很快就发展成争斗。我不得不迅速做出决定。扬可能品格高尚，但他也很天真，这很危险。现在一场战争正在进行，而在战争中，强者才能获胜。而法卡斯男爵是强者。这事虽并不光彩，但他给出的条件更好。至少扬现在和彼得在一起了。
zabij_jana_planovane_miro_uIWj

The idea of a peaceful handover was a naive one. First an argument broke out that soon grew into a fight. I had to make a quick decision. Jan might be honourable, but he's also naive, dangerously so. There is a war on, and in war, it's the strong that win. And Baron Farkas is strong.
和平交接的想法太过天真。双方先是发生了争执，很快就发展成争斗。我不得不迅速做出决定。扬可能品格高尚，但他也很天真，这很危险。现在一场战争正在进行，而在战争中，强者才能获胜。而法卡斯男爵是强者。
zabij_pro_dle_dlouhe_deba_Z3QR
After much debate and argument we decided that Father Prokop was the murderer. I then killed him and hopefully stopped his murderous rampage.
经过费尽心力的探究与讨论后，我们断定是普罗科普神父就是杀人凶手。随后我便将其杀死，只愿能以此终结他的屠杀行径。
zabij_pro_dle_nasi_dlouhe_CvDv
After a long debate in which we concluded Father Prokop was the murderer, I just couldn't bring myself to kill the old man. I didn't want to have that on my conscience.
经过了漫长的探讨，我们得出了普罗科普神父就是凶手的结论，但是并不想让自己良心不安的我，无法下手杀死一位年迈的老者。
zabij_pro_dohodli_jsme_se_LGRP
We agreed that Father Prokop was the murderer and that we needed to kill him to stop his murderous rampage.
我们都认为普罗科普神父就是杀人凶手，为阻止他惨无人道的屠杀行为，我们必须把他杀死。
zeptej_se_bozena_mi_porad_zTA0
Bozhena told me where I could find the Cumans. They're camping near the pond where the nomads are.
博珍娜告诉我库曼人的位置。他们在池塘边扎营，和游牧民族待在一起。
zeptej_se_lovci_tibor_mi__IsR2
Natan told me where to find the Cumans. They're camping near the pond where the nomads are.
纳坦告诉我库曼人的位置。他们在池塘边扎营，和游牧民族待在一起。
ziskej_os_nasel_jsem_jano_AuNY

I've found Jan's remains. Thirty years on, all that's left is yellowed bones and a skull with a clump of red hair. No coffin - they simply wrapped him in a shroud and the worms soon got to work on him.
我找到了扬的遗体。三十年过去了，只剩下发黄的骨头和长着一丛红发的头骨。没有棺材——他们只给他用了裹尸布，虫子很快就啃噬了他的身体。
ziskej_os_za_hrbitovni_zd_z8VG
Apparently, there's a spot by the graveyard wall where Jan's body is buried. Finding and moving all the bones into the sacred ground of the graveyard will be dirty work.
显然，扬的尸体埋在墓地墙边某处。找到所有遗骨，并将它们移到墓地圣土，将是个脏活。
